get.summary: Get recent part analyses for a center.
get.description: Get recent part analyses for a center.

parameters.name: part_id
parameters.description: Optional part ID to filter analyses by specific part.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of analysis records to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Optional date (YYYY-MM-DD) to filter analyses created on that date.

get.summary: Get urgent (HIGH risk) parts for a center.
get.description: Get list of parts with HIGH risk level that need immediate attention and ordering.

parameters.name: riskLevel
parameters.description: Risk level filter (LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH). Default is HIGH.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of urgent parts to return. Default is 50.

post.description: Enqueue center forecast analysis job.

Generate slots for multiple centers and multiple dates. Capacity is automatically calculated based on the number of technicians assigned to shifts (WorkShift).
